casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey BOWES. No. 394A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2004. Leslie S. Robinson, Keith A. Williams, Greenville, for Bowes. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 5th day of April 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2004."
